root.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Declassified
root.description: OverviewCall of Duty: Black Ops Declassified is a PlayStation Vita entry in the Call of Duty franchise to be released in November 2012. It is set between Call of Duty: Black Ops and Black Ops II. It features 4v4 multiplayer via WiFi, and only Team Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed modes have been revealed. It is based upon the Infinity Ward engine that has been used for the last several console Call of Duty games.
